name: react-fastapi-pyodide-monorepo
description: Monorepo for React FastAPI Pyodide with bridge packages

scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:py && bun run build:ts
scripts.build:apps: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: bun run validate:operation-ids && cd apps/backend && python -m build
scripts.test: bun run validate:operation-ids && bun run test:packages && bun run test:apps
scripts.test:packages: bun run test:py && bun run test:ts
scripts.lint: bun run lint:ts && bun run lint:py
scripts.lint:ts: cd packages/pyodide-bridge-ts && bun run lint && cd ../../apps/frontend && bun run lint
scripts.lint:py: cd packages/pyodide-bridge-py && python -m black --check . && python -m isort --check-only .
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:ts && bun run lint:fix:py
scripts.lint:fix:ts: cd packages/pyodide-bridge-ts && bun run lint:fix && cd ../../apps/frontend && bun run lint:fix
scripts.lint:fix:py: cd packages/pyodide-bridge-py && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:apps

author: React FastAPI Pyodide
